Plot
Based on the 1971 novel by William Peter Blatty, The Exorcist marries 
three different scenarios into one extraordinary plot. A visiting 
actress in Washington, D.C., notices dramatic and dangerous changes in 
the behavior and physical make-up of her 12-year-old daughter. 
Meanwhile, a young priest at nearby Georgetown University begins to 
doubt his faith while dealing with his mother&#039;s terminal sickness. 
And, book-ending the story, a frail, elderly priest recognizes the 
necessity for a show-down with an old demonic enemy.
